--------------------- MoorDyn Waves grid File ----------------------------------
List of grid points, in 3 blocks (x, y, z)
Each block starts with a 2 (i.e. list of coords), and then th coordinates (m)
1
-50.0 -40.0 -30.0 -20.0 -10.0 0.0 10.0 20.0 30.0 40.0 50.0
1
-2.0 2.0
